content: आवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn round, revolve. {@--2@} To return, come or turn back; धेनुराववृते वनात् <ls>R. 1. 82</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 19</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 26.</ls> {@--3@} To go to or towards. {@--4@} To be restless or uneasy; <ls>Māl. 1. 41.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to turn or revolve; अक्षबलयमावर्तयंतं <ls>K. 42</ls> telling the beads. {@--2@} To roll, turn about or over. {@--3@} To cause to roll down, shed (as tears &c.). {@--4@} To attract, win over (see आवृज्) {@--5@} To repeat, recite.

आवृत् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Causing to turn towards. {@--2@} Turning towards or round; entering. {@--3@} Order, succession, method, mode, manner; अनयैवावृता कार्यं पिंडनिर्वपणं सुतैः <ls>Ms. 3. 248</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Progress of an action; occurrence. {@--5@} Turn of a path, course, direction. {@--6@} A purificatory rite; <ls>Ms. 2. 66.</ls>
